title: Booking Holdings | SE2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B. Tech in CSE (Tier 3 College)
Years of Experience: 5+
Prior Experience: Product Based MNC with Base 33 (TC 42)
Date of the Offer: 17th Feb 2025
Company: Booking Holdings (Booking.com)
Title/Level: SE2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 46,00,000 INR Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus:0L
Stock bonus: $20k RSUs vested over 3 years
Bonus: 15%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 58.7L for first year
Benefits: Standard (Free Food , free cab , travel reimbursement)
Other details:

Interview Experience - https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/6443762/Booking-Holdings-or-SE2-or-Bangalore-or-Feb-2025-Offer

title: AMAZON | SDE1 | Gurugram
content:
Education: B.tech CS from IIT (2024)
Experience: 8 Months 
Prior Experience: Quant at HFT
Prior CTC: 15L(base) + 12L(bonus over 4 years) = 27L
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: AMAZON
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Gurugram
Base Salary: 19.17L
Relocation Bonus: 1.5L
Signing Bonus: 6.47L (Year 1) + 5.18L (Year 2)
Stock bonus: 15.56L (Vesting cycle is 5% for Year 1, 15% for Year 2, 40% for Year 3 and Year 4)
Total comp (Base + Bonus + Stock): 47.88L CTC
Benefits:  Standard AMAZON benifits

title: OLA | SDE-1
content:
Education: B.Tech from tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 2
Prior Experience: Startup
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: OLA (Krutrim)
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 29 LPA (INR)
Variable: 3 LPA (INR)
Relocation: Hotel stay for 14 days, Food reimbursement
Joining Bonus: 10 Lakhs (INR)
Stocks: 8 Lakhs vested over 4 years (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%)
Other Benefits: Brokerage reimbursement
Total comp (Salary + Joining + Bonus + Stock): 50L (INR)
